workflow: Complete Contact Us form in new tab

trace.decision_reason: The workflow is to complete the Contact Us form. The current page is the Homepage. I need to click on the Contact Us link to navigate to the Contact Us form.
trace.expected_outcome: The page should navigate to the Contact Us form.

trace.decision_reason: I am on the contact us form. I need to fill out all the fields before submitting the form. I will start with the first name field.
trace.expected_outcome: The first name field will be filled with the value John.

trace.decision_reason: I need to fill the remaining fields in the contact form. The First Name field is already populated. I will proceed with filling the Last Name, Email Address, and Comments fields.
trace.expected_outcome: The last name field should be populated with 'Doe'.

trace.decision_reason: I have already filled the first name and last name. Now I need to fill in the email address and comments before submitting the form.
I have filled the first name, last name, and email address. Now I need to fill the Comments field and then submit the form.
trace.expected_outcome: The comments field should be filled with the provided text.

trace.decision_reason: All the fields are already filled. Now I should submit the form.
trace.expected_outcome: The contact form should be submitted and a success message should be displayed.
